ad_text: Junk-Boss Sponsored Safely operating a roll off dumpster truck ( Ford F550), and providing prompt, courteous and complete waste removal services for customers. Class B CDL is helpful, but not needed in this role. Driver is responsible for ensuring his or her vehicle is in compliance with the Company’s safety standards prior to operating the vehicle and completes vehicle condition reports (“VCRs”) on a daily basis to ensure that any vehicle defects are repaired in a timely manner. FULL-TIME · $17 - $18 / HOUR · EDMOND, OKLAHOMA Roll Off Driver Apply now
